0. use the SML Data Dashboard to recreate a dataset for 2024. (Wind Power and Wind Speed)


1. Use `lubridate` the date column a date data type. 


::: {.cell}

:::


2. Use tables and/or text to provide some background on the data. How many data points are there? Over what time frame? What are the means and ranges of some key parameters?


::: {.cell}

:::


3. Build a plot of daily power generation of solar and wind over the 2024 season so far.  Comment on the trends.  


::: {.cell}

:::


4. Build a plot of power generated so far in 2024 over time? How does the amount compare to the amount produced in the first part of 2023? Comment on the trends.  


::: {.cell}

:::



5. Build a plot of any two variables (or more!) that you find interesting. Write a few sentences of what you find. 


::: {.cell}
